official-title.#text:
To continue the use of a 3-month quarter EHR reporting period for health care providers to
			 demonstrate meaningful use for 2015 under the Medicare and Medicaid EHR
			 incentive payment programs, and for other purposes.

shall continue through 2015 (in the case of
